title: Real Madrid boss Xabi Alonso backed by Jude Bellingham but facing uncertain future after Man City defeat | Football News | Sky Sports

title: Xabi Alonso’s Real Madrid position in ‘serious danger’ as surprise replacement is shortlisted - Sports Mole
snippet: By Oliver Thomas | 09 Dec 2025 08:55, Last updated: 09 Dec 2025 13:06 · Real Madrid have reportedly identified a surprise replacement for under-fire head coach Xabi Alonso amid growing pressure on his job at Bernabeu.

title: Revealed: Real Madrid's manager shortlist if Xabi Alonso is sacked - Football España
snippet: The German coach has been very well regarded at Real Madrid for some time, but has in theory retired from management. On various occasions it has been assured that he is more than content in his role as Chief of Global Football Development at Red Bull. Posted by · Ruairidh Barlow 8 December 2025, 19:19 ·
